title: [FEA] Groupby support with Decimal column as key column
body:
```
import cudf
from cudf.core.dtypes import Decimal64Dtype

df = cudf.DataFrame({'id': [0, 1, 2]})

df['id_dec'] = df['id'].astype(Decimal64Dtype(7,2))

#works
df.groupby('id').count()

# fails
df.groupby('id_dec').count()
```
